thread.title: YVONNE POWELL

author: YVONNE POWELL
title: YVONNE POWELL
text: I have had 5 different flags in the past by other company's. They didn't last long in the weather. But the last one I had I got from American Flags lasted for a couple of years. I decided to go bigger with this one and got the all weather. The bigger the flag the better the wind picks it up and it was weather every penny spent. Keep making your flags the way you have been they last long and they are beautiful.
